post:
The SkySpace is back but rather than discounting our usual plans... we have some special plans this week and with a great offer for you as a member of vpsBoard!! Unbelievably cheap!!

The SkySpace is a trading name of JCKD (UK) Ltd. Our parent company is one that has been registered within the UK since 2011 and trading since 2008.

All of our servers are located in the DimeNOC datacenter in Orlando, Florida.

If you need a custom plan; use our "Custom Quote" contact form to get a server specific to your needs!

Use these codes for discounts off our standard packages... read below for this weeks special plans which require no code!

Discount #1:

Get 50% off your first invoice on any VPS server with The SkySpace.

Code: 50INITIAL

Discount #2:

Get 30% off any VPS server on our website for the lifetime of the VPS server!

Code: 30RECUR

We are a provider of VPS and dedicated servers. We offer unmanaged and managed services.

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Features / Why Us?:

-----------------------------------------------------

  • VPS servers are instantly setup.
  • Full root access and total control.
  • All our managed servers come with cPanel.
  • Premium network - All our providers are tier 1 and we use a 1Gbps uplink to ensure fast speeds. Our network also has fail-safe redundancy.
  • Server grade hardware - All our servers are very powerful quad-core servers that use server grade hardware.
  • 7 day money back guarantee.
  • Proactive monitoring for all managed servers.
  • 24/7 support team to assist with any issues you may have!
  • 99.9% uptime guarantee backed by an SLA.
  • Enterprise datacenter.
  • Choice of Linux OS
  • No contracts!
  • rDNS/PTR records available.
  • SolusVM virtualization control panel.
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
